title.rendered: Official Ikhala College Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Ikhala College consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Ikhala College admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Ikhala College based on the information provided within it.

Ikhala College Student Portal

Note: Ikhala College’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Ikhala College Prospectus 2024

The Ikhala College   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.ikhala.edu.za/.

Ikhala College PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
